page_content: The page is about eTax.UR, an electronic tax filing system for natural persons.
The page provides a PDF guide for AgriGIS, a software related to agriculture.
The page provides a PDF guide for Geo Uri, a software related to mapping and territorial planning.
The page is about environmental protection in private boating and shipping.
The page provides video tutorials for AgriGIS, a software related to agriculture.
The page is about fishing permits and introduces the Fishven Uri App for digital management of fishing activities.
The page provides information on how to register for eBill, an electronic billing system.
